mapper.select: SELECT ui.loginID, ui.name, s.suggestion_no, s.suggestion_category, s.suggestion_answered, s.suggestion_title, s.suggestion_content, DATE_FORMAT(s.suggestion_created_at , '%Y-%m-%d') as suggestion_created_at FROM tb_suggestion s LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_userinfo ui ON ui.loginID = s.loginID

SELECT ui.loginID, ui.name, s.suggestion_no, s.suggestion_category, s.suggestion_answered, s.suggestion_title, s.suggestion_content, DATE_FORMAT(s.suggestion_created_at , '%Y-%m-%d') as suggestion_created_at, f.file_origin, f.file_rename, f.file_local_path, f.file_server_path, f.file_size, f.file_extension FROM tb_suggestion s LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_userinfo ui ON ui.loginID = s.loginID LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file f ON f.file_no = s.file_no WHERE s.suggestion_no = #{pSuggestionNo};
